actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To permit duty free treatment for certain structures, parts, and components used in the Gemini Telescope Project.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to admit duty free, after March 31, 1997, certain structures, parts, and components used in the Gemini Telescopes Project, in Mauna Kea, Hawaii.

titles.title: To permit duty free treatment for certain structures, parts, and components used in the Gemini Telescope Project.
